name: Text-to-Image Generation with Flux AI, Google Drive Storage & Sheets Logging
description:
# üé® AI Image Generator with Flux AI 

Generate realistic, high-quality images from text prompts using the **Flux AI Text-to-Image Generator API** via RapidAPI, and seamlessly store the results in Google Drive and log them in Google Sheets ‚Äî all automated using **n8n**.

---

## üß† What This Workflow Does

This no-code automation enables you to:
- üñãÔ∏è Enter a **custom text prompt** using a web form.
- üñºÔ∏è Generate a **photorealistic image** using **[Flux AI‚Äôs Text-to-Image Generator](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/text-to-image-generator-flux)** via [RapidAPI](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/text-to-image-generator-flux).
- ‚òÅÔ∏è Upload the image to **Google Drive**.
- üìä Log the prompt and result in a **Google Sheet**.
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Capture and log errors in a fallback sheet.

---

## üí° Use Case

Ideal for:
- Digital artists and marketers
- Social media managers
- Brand mockup creators
- Rapid concept prototyping

All without writing a single line of code.

---

## ‚úÖ Benefits

- **No-code automation** for AI-generated images
- **Cloud storage** and structured logging
- **Error handling** built-in
- **Fast content creation** for design, branding, or concept testing
- **Powered by** the [Flux AI Text-to-Image Generator API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/text-to-image-generator-flux) via **RapidAPI**

---

## üß© Node-by-Node Breakdown

### 1. üìù On Form Submission
- Accepts user input for a creative text prompt.
- üîç Example: ‚ÄúA silver can with vapor and blue lightning background.‚Äù
- üí° Benefit: No technical knowledge needed.

---

### 2. üåê HTTP Request ‚Äî Flux AI API
- Sends the prompt to the **[Flux AI Text-to-Image Generator API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/text-to-image-generator-flux)** via **RapidAPI**.
- üì¶ Returns an image encoded in base64.
- üí° Benefit: Seamless integration with cutting-edge image generation.

---

### 3. üß™ Code Node ‚Äî Base64 Decoder
- Converts the base64 image to a binary `.jpg` file.
- üí° Benefit: Readies the image for upload/download/sharing.

---

### 4. üìÅ Google Drive
- Uploads the generated image to your Google Drive folder.
- üí° Benefit: Secure, sharable cloud storage.

---

### 5. üìä Google Sheets ‚Äî Success Log
- Appends a row with the original prompt, filename, and generation date.
- üí° Benefit: Tracks history of all generated images.

---

### 6. ‚ö†Ô∏è IF Node ‚Äî Error Detection
- Checks if the image generation failed.
- üí° Benefit: Prevents workflow from halting and routes to error logging.

---

### 7. üìâ Google Sheets ‚Äî Error Log
- Logs failed prompts and error messages.
- üí° Benefit: Helps identify what went wrong (e.g. malformed prompt).

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Challenges Solved

| Problem | How This Workflow Fixes It |
|--------|-----------------------------|
| Manual prompt-based image generation is slow | Fully automated with Flux AI |
| No storage pipeline for generated images | Integrated with Google Drive |
| No audit trail for prompts/images | Logged into Google Sheets |
| Errors go unnoticed in image generation | Built-in error check and logging |
| Users lack API access or dev experience | Friendly web form UI |

---

## üîó API Spotlight

This workflow is powered by the **[Flux AI Text-to-Image Generator API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/text-to-image-generator-flux)** ‚Äî available exclusively on **RapidAPI**.

### Why use this API?
- Ultra-fast text-to-image rendering
- High-resolution results
- Developer-friendly and cost-effective
- Great for branding, mockups, and visuals

We‚Äôve integrated this API to make advanced image generation accessible with just a prompt ‚Äî no AI or dev experience required.

---

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

values.placeholder: A photograph of a "Mateen" Sommer Edition energy drink can, suspended in mid-air against a cool, gradient backdrop. The sleek silver can prominently displays the vibrant "Neo hair lotion" flavor, adorned with dynamic blue and white graphics and heavily frosted with condensation. Surrounding the can is a swirling cloud of frosty vapor composed of irregularly shaped, shimmering ice cubes, illuminated by a focused spotlight that highlights the can's metallic sheen. Soft, diffused lighting emphasizes the crispness of the energy drink and creates a refreshing atmosphere, setting it against a backdrop shifting from deep indigo to a lighter sky blue.

parameters.formDescription: Add prompt to generate desired image

parameters.content:
# üé® AI Image Generator with Flux AI 

Generate images from text prompts using **Flux AI Text-to-Image Generator API** and automatically store results in **Google Drive** and log them in **Google Sheets**.

---

## üß† Workflow Overview
- **Form Submission**: User inputs a text prompt.
- **API Request**: Sends prompt to **Flux AI Text-to-Image Generator** via [RapidAPI](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/text-to-image-generator-flux).
- **Image Processing**: Converts base64 image into a binary file.
- **Google Drive Upload**: Saves the generated image to Drive.
- **Google Sheets Log**: Stores prompt, image name, and date in Sheets.
- **Error Handling**: Captures errors and logs them in a fallback sheet.

---

## ‚úÖ Benefits
- **Automated AI Image Generation** without coding.
- **Cloud storage** on Google Drive.
- **Error Logging** for easier troubleshooting.
- **Real-time tracking** in Google Sheets.

---

## üöÄ Challenges Solved
- **No API knowledge required**: Simplifies image generation.
- **Error detection**: Ensures no failed processes go unnoticed.
- **Automated file storage**: Direct upload to Google Drive.

---

## üîó API: [Flux AI Text-to-Image Generator](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/text-to-image-generator-flux)
- Fast, high-quality, text-to-image API.
- **Generate images** with just a prompt.

---

### 1. üìù On Form Submission
- Accepts user input for a creative text prompt.
- üîç Example: ‚ÄúA silver can with vapor and blue lightning background.‚Äù
- üí° Benefit: No technical knowledge needed.

### 2. üåê HTTP Request ‚Äî Flux AI API
- Sends the prompt to the **[Flux AI Text-to-Image Generator API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/text-to-image-generator-flux)** via **RapidAPI**.
- üì¶ Returns an image encoded in base64.
- üí° Benefit: Seamless integration with cutting-edge image generation.

### 3. üß™ Code Node ‚Äî Base64 Decoder
- Converts the base64 image to a binary `.jpg` file.
- üí° Benefit: Readies the image for upload/download/sharing.

### 4. üìÅ Google Drive
- Uploads the generated image to your Google Drive folder.
- üí° Benefit: Secure, sharable cloud storage.

### 5. üìä Google Sheets ‚Äî Success Log
- Appends a row with the original prompt, filename, and generation date.
- üí° Benefit: Tracks history of all generated images.

### 6. ‚ö†Ô∏è IF Node ‚Äî Error Detection
- Checks if the image generation failed.
- üí° Benefit: Prevents workflow from halting and routes to error logging.

### 7. üìâ Google Sheets ‚Äî Error Log
- Logs failed prompts and error messages.
- üí° Benefit: Helps identify what went wrong (e.g. malformed prompt).
